content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. What price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe that the location and condition of your apartment are quite good. However, as a student, I am looking for the best deal possible. I'm hoping we can find a price that is mutually beneficial. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide quality accommodations to my tenants. Since you are a student, I'm willing to offer a fair price. What is your budget for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, as a student, I have to be mindful of my expenses. I'm looking to keep my rent within a certain range. Would you be able to offer me a price that is around 700 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Haoyu. While I appreciate your budget, I must be honest with you. The going rate for apartments of this quality in the city center is typically higher. However, considering your situation as a student, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we start at 800 Euros per month? This is already a reduced rate for the location and amenities provided.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 800 Euros per month is quite close to my budget limit. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly discuss a price that is slightly lower, say around 750 Euros per month? This would be more in line with what I can afford as a student.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I understand that every Euro counts when you're a student. Let's try to find a middle ground. How about this: If you are willing to pay a deposit of one month's rent, I could consider 775 Euros per month. This is a special offer for you, considering the apartment's location and new construction. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 775 Euros per month, with a deposit of one month's rent, is very generous considering the apartment's location and condition. I appreciate your effort to accommodate my budget. I would be willing to accept this offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Haoyu. Your willingness to negotiate has been commendable. To formalize our agreement, please provide me with your preferred method of payment for the deposit and the first month's rent. Once we have the payment details sorted, we can proceed with the lease signing.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will provide you with the payment details shortly. I'm looking forward to moving into this apartment and establishing a good relationship with you as my landlord.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Haoyu. I'm pleased to have you as a tenant. Once you've provided the payment details, I'll draw up the lease agreement. We'll include a clause that outlines any additional responsibilities and terms of the lease. Is there anything specific you would like to see included in the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
